Technically, ss are detectable. Maybe you can't find out what have been transferred, but you can doubt someone using ss, and make sure after a simple test. It's because ss was not design to deal with such a situation.
My suggestion is, don't use anyone of ss family, at least recently, don't. ss or ssr, just don't use them neither. China's anti-anti-GFW strategy has periods. Recently, it's seems to be ss. I don't wanna try if it is truth by myself. You may try ss/ssr again after a month or two. If it's really has problem, you'll be blocked. But police will not after you.

breakwa11 don't wanna open the source code of the ssr at the first time. cuz once it public to the world, GFW can learn how to deal with it.
